byline.contributor: Amy Chozick, Patrick Healy and Thomas Kaplan contributed reporting.

abstract: Authorities say no one was hurt after plane carrying Republican vice-presidential nominee Mike Pence skidded off runway at La Guardia Airport while landing in heavy rain.

headline.print_headline: Plane Carrying Pence Skids Off a Rainy Runway at La Guardia
headline.main: Plane With Mike Pence Aboard Skids Off La Guardia Runway

snippet: No one was injured as the plane landed, according to social media....
lead_paragraph: No one was injured as the plane landed, according to social media.
